title: NA Speaker commends Security Forces for Awaran counterterrorism operation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 16 (APP):Speaker of the National Assembly (NA), Sardar Ayaz Sadiq, on Wednesday lauded the security forces for their successful operation against terrorists in Awaran, praising their courage and commitment to safeguarding national security.
In a heartfelt statement, the Speaker commended the professionalism and effectiveness of the security forces in their ongoing operations against terrorism, calling their efforts a testament to Pakistan’s unwavering resolve.
The Speaker expressed profound sorrow over the martyrdom of Major Syed Rab Nawaz Tariq during the counterterrorism operation in Awaran.
He paid glowing tribute to Major Tariq’s courage and unwavering dedication, describing him as a symbol of valor in the fight against terrorism.
The nation pays heartfelt tribute to the courage and heroism of Major Syed Rab Nawaz Tariq, whose sacrifice stands as a beacon of resilience and patriotism.
Martyrs like him are the true guardians of Pakistan’s security and freedom. Elements such as Fitan-e-Hind, operating under Indian patronage in Balochistan, will meet a decisive and unforgiving end.
Speaker affirmed that the entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with the security forces in their mission to eradicate terrorism.
He emphasized that the sacrifices of Pakistan’s brave officers and soldiers will never be forgotten, and that their unwavering commitment is a source of national pride.
“The nation is proud of its courageous sons in uniform, whose valor continues to safeguard our future,” he said.
Speaker stated that stated that the entire nation, alongside its security forces, will resolutely defeat every conspiracy hatched by the enemy.
He hailed those who lay down their lives for Pakistan’s defense and stability as the true heroes of the nation.
